languages.text: Даже столь монументальное творение, как статуя Бога-Императора на Футфоле, нуждается в периодическом ремонте. За новые цепи, приковывающие астероиды к статуе, станция готова расплатиться тысячами наемников.

Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.
languages.original_text: Даже столь монументальное творение, как статуя Бога-Императора на Футфоле, нуждается в периодическом ремонте. За новые цепи, приковывающие астероиды к статуе, станция готова расплатиться тысячами наемников.

traits.locale_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

languages.text: Même une création aussi monumentale que la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu sur Castel requiert un entretien régulier. La station est disposée à offrir des milliers de mercenaires en échange d'un nouvel ensemble de chaînes pour relier les astéroïdes à la statue.
languages.original_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

traits.locale_text: Même une création aussi monumentale que la statue de l'Empereur-Dieu sur Castel requiert un entretien régulier. La station est disposée à offrir des milliers de mercenaires en échange d'un nouvel ensemble de chaînes pour relier les astéroïdes à la statue.

languages.text: フットフォールの神帝陛下の像のような記念碑的な創造物であっても、定期的なメンテナンスは必要だ。ステーションは、小惑星を彫像に縛り付ける新しい鎖が手に入るなら、何千もの傭兵に金銭をばらまくことをいとわない。
languages.original_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールの神帝陛下の像のような記念碑的な創造物であっても、定期的なメンテナンスは必要だ。ステーションは、小惑星を彫像に縛り付ける新しい鎖が手に入るなら、何千もの傭兵に金銭をばらまくことをいとわない。

languages.text: 即便是落脚港帝皇雕像这种神圣、伟大的纪念物，也需要接受定期维护。空间站愿意以几千名雇佣兵作为交换，想要换到一批新的锁链，将小行星带牢牢地固定在雕像上。
languages.original_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

traits.locale_text: 即便是落脚港帝皇雕像这种神圣、伟大的纪念物，也需要接受定期维护。空间站愿意以几千名雇佣兵作为交换，想要换到一批新的锁链，将小行星带牢牢地固定在雕像上。

languages.text: Incluso una creación tan monumental como la estatua del Dios Emperador en Paso requiere un mantenimiento regular. La estación está dispuesta a pagar con miles de mercenarios un nuevo juego de cadenas para atar los asteroides a la estatua.
languages.original_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

traits.locale_text: Incluso una creación tan monumental como la estatua del Dios Emperador en Paso requiere un mantenimiento regular. La estación está dispuesta a pagar con miles de mercenarios un nuevo juego de cadenas para atar los asteroides a la estatua.

languages.text: Selbst ein so monumentales Werk wie die Statue des Gottimperators auf Footfall muss regelmäßig gewartet werden. Die Station benötigt neue Ketten, um die Asteroiden an die Statue zu binden, und würde dafür mit tausenden von Söldnern bezahlen.
languages.original_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.

traits.locale_text: Selbst ein so monumentales Werk wie die Statue des Gottimperators auf Footfall muss regelmäßig gewartet werden. Die Station benötigt neue Ketten, um die Asteroiden an die Statue zu binden, und würde dafür mit tausenden von Söldnern bezahlen.

languages.text: Tanrı İmparator'un Binliman'daki heykeli gibi devasa bir eser bile düzenli bakıma ihtiyaç duyar. İstasyon, asteroitleri heykele bağlamak için gereken yeni zincir takımları karşılığında binlerce paralı asker vermeye hazır.
languages.original_text: Even a creation as monumental as the God-Emperor's statue on Footfall requires regular maintenance. The station is willing to pay with thousands of mercenaries in exchange for a new set of chains to bind the asteroids to the statue.
